description: Try our easy to follow Mixed Mushrooms, Spinach, And Orange Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mixed Mushrooms, Spinach, And Orange Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the dressing. Put the olive oil and vinegar in a jug or small bowl, and whisk until combined. Add a little of the juice reserved from segmenting the oranges for the salad, together with the caster sugar and mustard. Season with salt and black pepper, whisk again, and taste. Add a little more of the orange juice if needed. Leave the dressing to stand for a while, to allow the flavours to infuse.

To make the salad, put the mushrooms in a large bowl. Add the chilli flakes, and drizzle over a little of the dressing. Toss together. Leave to stand for 10 minutes, then add the spring onions and orange segments, and gently toss to combine.
When ready to serve, add the spinach and basil leaves, and more of the dressing. Taste, and season again if needed. Serve immediately.
